summary.span: 類別的每個屬性是 ，其為 Windows 顯示項目的色彩。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用鍵盤快速鍵設定屬性。The following code example shows how to set a keyboard shortcut using the property. 它也會示範如何使用方法。It also demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼到表單，請處理表單的事件和呼叫下列方法，傳遞`e`為。To run this example, paste the code into a form, handle the form's event and call the following method, passing `e` as . summary.span: 取得 ，其為選取之項目的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets a that is the color of the background of selected items.
A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 例如，筆刷可能使用的清單方塊中選取項目的背景色彩。For example, the brush may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.
